Package helpers

Class StateManager

java.lang.Object
helpers.StateManager
public class StateManager extends Object
This is the game state. There is mainmenu, game, editor, maps, gameover, gamewon. mainmenu is for the main menu, game for the game itself, editor for the custom map building, maps for the predefined maps that there are in the game, gameover when player loses, gamewon when player wins.
Author:
Paul
